metadata.title: CVE-2021-31866 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.0.9 and 4.1.x before 4.1.3 allows an attacker to learn thevalues of internal authentication keys by observing timing differences instring comparison operations within SysController andMailHandlerController.

criterions.comment: redmine package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
